ch.cern.dod.ui.model

Class UpgradesListModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.zkoss.zul.AbstractListModel
      • ch.cern.dod.ui.model.UpgradesListModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, org.zkoss.zul.ext.Selectable, org.zkoss.zul.ext.Sortable, org.zkoss.zul.ListModel

    public class UpgradesListModel
extends org.zkoss.zul.AbstractListModel
implements org.zkoss.zul.ext.Sortable
    Represents a list of upgrades. It implements sorting to save it from query to query.
    Author:
    Daniel Gomez Blanco
    See Also:
